description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Born of atomic death! Raised in the shadow of a mushroom cloud! He's a squid! Not an Octopus! He's Squid Yes! Not So Octopus! And he's very irritable.  A classic single player, psychedelic, retro styled, arena shooter. The aim of the game is to score as close to 9 as possible whilst not succumbing to the invading masses.
description.short: Born of atomic death! Raised in the shadow of a mushroom cloud! He's a squid! Not an Octopus! He's Squid Yes! Not So Octopus! And he's very irritable.  A classic single player, psychedelic, retro styled, arena shooter. The aim of the game is to score as close to 9 as possible whilst not succumbing to the invading masses.
